pages.text: seon-eul haenghaneun jadeul-eul wihan bog eum-imyeo jabila
ideul-eun yebaeleul deuligo iseullamseleul bachimyeo naeseleul hwagsinhadoda
ideul-i junim-eulobuteo indoleul bad-eul jayo ideul-i beonseonghal jadeul-i la
geuleona salamdeul jung-eneun mu-ighan-iyagilo aneun geos eobs-i hananim-ui gil-eul talseonke hageona geugeos-eul jolong haneun jadeul-i issnani geudeul-eun gul-yog jeog-in beol-eul badge doelila
hananim-ui malsseum-i geuaege nangsong doel ttaemyeon geuui du gwiga beong-eolilo machi geugeos-eul deudji anhneungeoscheoleom o man-eul piuni gotongseuleoun beol-i iss eul geos-ila gyeong-gohala
geuleona sillo mid-eum-eul gajgo seon eul silcheonhaneun jadeul-egeneun chugbog-ui cheongug-i issgeoneul
geu an-eseo yeongsaenghanila sillo hananim-ui yagsog-eun jinsil-ini geubun-eun gwonneung-gwa jihyelo chungmanhasim-ila

hananim-eun neohuiga bodeus gidong eobs-i haneul-eul changjohasyeossgo daeji wi e gojeongdoen san-eul sewo neohuilo hayeo geum heundeulliji ani hadolog hayeoss-eu myeo geu an-e modeun dongmul-i beonseonghado log hasyeossdoda ttohan haneullobuteo bi leul naelige hayeo geu an-e ongaj gwi han jongdeul-i ja-eung-eulo jalage hasyeoss nola
igeos-i balo hananim-ui changjo igeoneul geubun oee nuga mueos-eul chang jo haessneunyo naege boyeodao geuleona joeindeul-eun bunmyeonghi jalmos-sog-e ppajyeo issnola
